mapper.insert: INSERT INTO run_board(id, email, subject, content) VALUES(#{id},#{email}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM run_board ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{endNum}
mapper.update: update run_board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, logtime=now() where seq=#{seq}
update run_board set hit = hit+1 where seq=#{seq}
